errors.symptom: Application became unresponsive after YAML modification: after adding abstract display configuration to display_rules.yaml, the interface stopped responding and user discovered Docker had disconnected. User stated: 'Adesso non è più caricata, perché? Ah, è staccato docker. Si è staccato docker'
errors.trigger: Modifying display_rules.yaml to add abstract property configuration and attempting to create new record

errors.symptom: Uncertainty about display order configuration: user initially thought they needed to explicitly set an 'order' property to position abstract below title, but then realized physical position in YAML file determines display order. User stated: 'Properties should appear under the title in the display order. Quindi adesso appear in effetti under title. Ma perché? Ah, perché fisicamente credo che stia proprio under title. Quindi non è che devo metterci l'order come proprietà'
errors.trigger: Reading task requirement that abstract should appear under title in display order
